requirement: This code is intended to implement the update logic for door animation values based on open, close, and floor call commands within specified constraints.
provide_code:
FUNCTION F_UpdateDoorAnimation : DINT
VAR_INPUT
	bOpenDoor		:	BOOL;		// 开门命令
	bCloseDoor		:	BOOL;		// 关门命令
	bCallFloor		:	BOOL;		// 该楼层有呼叫
	nCurrentAni		:	DINT;		// 当前动画值
	nMaxAni			:	DINT := 70;	// 最大动画值
END_VAR
